nodes.text: Team Alderaan was a Limmie Cup team. Formed from Alderaanians, it counted among its players as of 0 BBY one of the galaxy's fastest athletes, Cael Hanarist. That year, the Galactic Empire annihilated Alderaan as the team was playing in the Cup on the planet Fondor. The news of their homeworld's destruction devastated the team, and the Cup was placed on hiatus. The team members broke apart, and Hanarist soon joined the Rebel Alliance.
Team Alderaan was mentioned in Cael Hanarist's Character Folio included with Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game.
